text: The Enniskillen bombing took place on 8 November 1987 in Enniskillen, County Fermanagh, Northern Ireland.30th anniversary of Enniskillen bombing A Provisional Irish Republican Army bomb exploded near the town's centotaph during a Remembrance Sunday ceremony. The ceremony was commemorating members of the British Armed Forces who had been killed in wars. == References == Category:1987 in Europe Category:1980s building bombings Category:1980s explosions in Europe Category:1980s in Northern Ireland Category:1980s murders in the United Kingdom Category:Attacks on buildings and structures in Northern Ireland Category:Building bombings in the United Kingdom Category:Explosions in Northern Ireland Category:Mass murder in Northern Ireland Category:Provisional Irish Republican Army Category:Terrorist incidents in the United Kingdom in the 1980s
title: Enniskillen bombing
